projectsCopy: A selection of the work I’m most proud of. Each project highlights my skills in web development, from clean, responsive design to interactive functionality. Here, you’ll see how I turn ideas into practical solutions, experimenting with modern tools and frameworks like JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS. Whether it’s a personal experiment, a portfolio piece, or a complex application, each project reflects my passion for problem-solving and continuous learning. Dive in to explore the projects and the code behind them.
